Bambi
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Bambi installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Bambi, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Bambi/0.7.1-intel-2021b
```
